# passActivationState

**Instance Property**

The activation state of the pass.

## Declaration

```swift
var passActivationState: PKSecureElementPass.PassActivationState { get }
```

## Discussion

You must activate a secure pass before it can be used.

For possible values and their meanings, see [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKSecureElementPass/PassActivationState-swift.enum].

## Getting the activation state

- **PKSecureElementPass.PassActivationState**: The activation states of a Secure Element pass.
